p: DPPH scavenging activity (%) = (A c − A t)/A c × 100, where A t is the absorbance of the test sample and A c is the absorbance of the control. Commercially-available BHT was used as positive control. All half maximal inhibitory concentration (IC 50) values of tested activities were determined by the liner regression of the percentage of remaining DPPH radical against the sample concentration.
